name: Howl of Despair
description: Crush an enemy with a deafening howl, dealing 2999 Physical Damage.  Enemies who are facing you take 10% more damage from this attack.  Allies targeting the enemy can activate the Feeding Frenzy synergy, which grants them Empower for 5 seconds, increasing their damage done with Light and Heavy Attacks by 40%.
effectLines: Grants a synergy to allies that grants them Empower.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Crush an enemy with a deafening howl, dealing $1 Physical Damage.  Enemies who are facing you take 10% more damage from this attack.  Allies targeting the enemy can activate the Feeding Frenzy synergy, which grants them Empower for 5 seconds, increasing their damage done with Light and Heavy Attacks by 40%.
